pullRequest.title: Make pinot-distribution to build a pinot-all jar and assemble it
pullRequest.bodyText:
build one fat jar with full dependencies in pinot-distribution, called  pinot-all-${project.version}-jar-with-dependencies.jar
in pinot-distribution, replace all the jars under lib/*.jar with this pinot-all-${project.version}-jar-with-dependencies.jar.
clean up pinot-plugins dependencies and ensure pinot-spi/pinot-common/pinot-core are in provided scope for all the plugins pom files.

Current distribution directory looks like:
pinot-distribution/target/apache-pinot-incubating-0.3.0-SNAPSHOT-bin/apache-pinot-incubating-0.3.0-SNAPSHOT-bin

commit.message: Make pinot-distribution to build a pinot-all-in-one jar and assemble that into pinot distribution

nodes.bodyText: we already specify this in root
